title: Clients Froze and Stuck at authenticating at login screen.

replies.body: I have Charter Spectrum.  Do any of you?  I've seen it on a related board, but don't know how much of a factor that is.
still down... fml my last night before im stuck with adulting til sunday thanks riot...
I have 'centrylink'.... and it's running fine... haven't been able to login for 3 days now... stuck at authenticating...

We did notice quite a spike in Login issues at around 1:20 pm PST, and most of these issues were originating from players who used Charter Spectrum as their ISP. It does seem like the majority of the problems have cleared out, but please let me know in a comment [**over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/EdHm3dWu-105-unable-to-loginstuck-at-authenticating) if you still can't get authenticated!
I'm getting the same error. I've been gone all day for work now i'm finally home ready to relax and this happens..
